prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just wanted to see how your day is going.  
Don't forget our meeting tomorrow at 10 AM. Looking forward to it!  
Your package has been shipped and should arrive by Friday.  
Hi Mom, I will be a bit late for dinner. Hope that’s okay!  
Just a reminder to pay your electricity bill by the end of the week.  
I really enjoyed catching up yesterday. Let’s do it again soon!  
Your OTP is 123456. Please use it to complete your transaction.  
Hey! Are we still on for the movie tonight? Let me know!  
I received your application and we’d like to schedule an interview this week.  
Can you send me the notes from last week’s meeting? Thanks!  
Just checking in to see if you’ve heard back from the doctor.  
Your subscription will renew on the 15th. Let us know if you have any questions!  
I hope you’re feeling better! Let me know if you need anything.  
We are excited to announce the community picnic this Saturday!  
Your bank statement is ready to view online.  
Thanks for helping out at the event! Your support made a difference.  
I’ll be out of the office until Wednesday. Please contact Sarah for urgent matters.  
Did you remember to pick up the groceries?  
The concert tickets are confirmed! Can’t wait!  
Hey! Just wanted to remind you about our book club meeting this Friday.  
I just transferred the money as discussed. Please check and confirm.  
Let’s plan a day trip next weekend! Any ideas on where to go?  
Your appointment with Dr. Smith is confirmed for Tuesday at 3 PM.  
Thanks for the feedback on my presentation! I appreciate it.  
I saw your message about lunch; what time works for you?  
Your delivery is scheduled for tomorrow between 2 PM and 4 PM.  
Hope you’re having a great week! Just wanted to say hi.  
Don’t forget to submit your report by Friday!  
I’ll pick up the kids from school today.  
Excited for the team building event next month!  
Your order was successfully placed. Thank you for shopping with us!  
Can you remind me to call the plumber tomorrow?  
Just checking in on how your project is going. Need any help?  
We missed you at the meeting today! Let’s catch up soon.  
Your feedback is important to us! Please take a minute to complete our survey.  
I’m really proud of you for finishing that project!  
Looking forward to our game night this weekend!  
Your warranty is about to expire. Please take action to avoid any issues.  
I’m here for you if you want to talk about anything.  
Did you get the chance to read that article I sent you?  
Your password needs to be updated for security reasons.  
Thanks for the reminder about the deadline, I appreciate it!  
Can we reschedule our coffee date to next week?  
Your balance is low; please consider making a deposit soon.  
I hope your presentation went well today! Can’t wait to hear about it.  
We’re planning a surprise party for Sarah’s birthday. Want to help?  
Your feedback has been submitted successfully. Thank you!  
Hey! Just wanted to check if you’re free for a quick call later.  
The gym is offering a special promo for new members this month.  
I’m thinking of trying that new restaurant this weekend. Want to join?  
Your shipment is delayed due to weather conditions. We apologize for the inconvenience.  
Just wanted to say good luck on your exam tomorrow! You’ll do great!  
Your account has been successfully updated. Thank you for your patience!  
I hope you have a wonderful vacation next week! Safe travels!
